Title: Dragon Ball Z: Bio-Broly
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original manga "Dragon Ball"), Takao Koyama (screenplay)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Takeshi Kusao, Daisuke Gôri, Mayumi Tanaka
Plot: Mr. Satan is challenged to a fight by an old rival, and he is taken to an island where the fight is to be held. Accompanying him are Android 18, who is making sure he doesn't skip town ...
